website_summaries.verdict: A versatile life jacket that won't hinder your dog's natural movement.
pros: Consists of CA65 standard-approved materials, guaranteeing the life jacket is constructed to last
Uses up to 50% more flotation material than most other brands
Sold in sizes that range from extra-small to extra-large to fit dogs of all shapes and sizes
cons: Much heavier than many comparable dog life jackets

customer_reviews.title: Great Life Jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jacket! The fit is great and my dog doesn't mind wearing it, whereas others he's tried on he won't walk around in. We got a medium- he's a 30 lb Frenchie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% happy with this purchase. You know when you order something on Amazon and kind of hope for the best.... Well this life jacket surprised me with excellent quality and an amazing fit. My dog loves it. It wraps at bottom so it is almost the feeling of a thunder shirt for the dog. I have an eleven year old shepherd who is an excellent swimmer because of his age I wanted backup. I highly recommend this jacket and will be ordering two more for my other dogs. I got XL for 90 pound shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: dogowner

customer_reviews.title: Great lifejacket
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my dog! She wasn't uncomfortable in it at all. It fit perfectly and it looks great on her too! I used one of the two holes under the handle to put a leash on her just in case she jumped out of the boat because she can't swim. I ordered her a medium-she's about 50 lbs. it has a total of three straps-two under the belly and one around the neck ON TOP of the Velcro part. Very nice extra security.
customer_reviews.author: samiisambam

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ! It BETTER fit...or else.....
customer_reviews.text: This product didnt fit despite measurements listed. I bought a medium but now need a large. BUYER BEWARE if this doesnt fit it will cost you $7.25 UPS drop off and $13.25 UPS pickup to RETURN IT! There are plenty of other sellers on amazon that sell this type of item with free returns in case it doesnt fit. Keep looking....this isnt the one....
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a Dachshund!
customer_reviews.text: This vest fit like a glove. I love the range of motion it allows. Doxies already have short little legs and need to be able to use them! So much better than previous ones I've tried. I highly recommend to all daschund owners. I bought the XS. He is 12 pds, neck is 11in, chest is 17.5in
customer_reviews.author: andi_michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and reasonable price. I have two small chihuahua mixes and I bought the XS for them. They actually seem to like wearing them I think it feels like a thunder shirt to them. The reflectors are great too because I can see them when they are running around when its dark. I'm not sure if they realize they are floating but it is nice to know that they will never drown.
customer_reviews.author: Natgeo_wild

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This vest was exactly what was promised, and the Large was a perfect fit for our 50lb, 9 month old German Shepherd. It is well made too. All of the connections are secured with well made Velcro, and then reinforced by clasps. It made our dog feel secure as well. Aside from the awesome function, the vest is very fashionable too! We couldn’t get over how adorable she looked in it. The added weight, and snugness also had the affect of making her very relaxed, and for a wild puppy that was pretty impressive. I have recommended this vest to other dog owners already, and will continue to do so. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul and Tina Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The vest arrived very quickly, as usual, It looks very sturdy. The front strapping is a little stiff, however, my dog is large and vigorous so I think she can handle it. She is a Golden Retriever Akbash mix about 85 pounds, long and slim. I ordered the XL considering the other reviewer's comments and it fits perfectly. Therefore if you have a fairly large dog get the XL. I ordered this because we will take her to see the Pacific Ocean this summer for the first time and since she loves, loves water I was concerned she'd be swept out. I'll try it out in a nearby pond first and let you know how it worked.
customer_reviews.author: SiskiyouMtnRider

customer_reviews.title: Best vest compared to the rest!
customer_reviews.text: My dog swims vertically as pit bulls are not natural swimmers.This life jacket is excellent,it keeps my dog completely horizontal durning swimming while being able to move faster in the water.It also does not affect his movement or agility while running or walking.Also the large was a perfect fit,my dog fluctuates weight between 60 & 65lbs.The one thing I love the most about this vest though is it grabs everyone's attention!Polo is officially a lady killer..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've returned roughly 3-4 life vests for my dog over the past two years, each one either limited movement or was just a sloppy design. This lifevest is a game changer! It's designed to allow your dog to move freely, run, jump, and swim without any rubbing or restriction. The vest comes with a handle and a clip in the back to hook your leash, it's really great, and for the price, it can't be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: Terra J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yorkies
customer_reviews.text: Our yorkie boy is about 7 kg (14 lbs), we got the xs and he had a blast in it. Bought one in pink for the girl. These were awesome they were able to play in the sand jump in the creek and run around. (Jungle creek proof tested).
customer_reviews.author: Jo-anne K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog HATES wearing clothing, and also hates the water. However, he is much more comfortable/confident with this life vest. With this vest on, I was able to teach him to paddle board with me. We got lots of comments on how cute he looked in it. He fell in a couple times, and the vest helped him swim right back to the board, and I was able to pick him up by the little handle on the top and easily lift him back in. I would definitely recommend this to anyone bringing their dog out on the water. He’s a 10 lb Chihuahua/Pomeranian and the XS fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: Emelynn Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Not a thick life vest. Follow size chart should be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Update Tried the vest at the beach. The foam inside will soak water. The entire jacket is wet and heavy. My dog can swim with it, but It doesn't help much because it soak water. The material (foam) inside isn't very thick as others you see at petco. Quality seems ok to me but not sure if it provides enough safety. The craftsmanship is alright for its price. The Bichon is 16 lb and wearing a XS. Her chest is around 18" and the neck measurement is about 12".
customer_reviews.author: PickyNoseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: not gonna last - update:  replacement offered
customer_reviews.text: 12/10/19 update: Seller contacted me and very nicely offered me a replacement. Can't argue with excellent customer service. The stitching was failing right out of the packaging, and has steadily gotten worse - see photo. Will be unusable at some point soon, unfortunately, as the failure is the seam attaching one side of the velcro to the neck flap. Pretty critical part. That said, it is otherwise a solid PFD for your four legged pal...if you have the sewing skills to repair it. I don't. I probably should have returned it right away but did not, and that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve St. Evry

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: While we have not tested in water yet, my 40 lb standard poodle loves her medium. While she does not yet love boating, we are trying to break her in gently. The vest fit her when she was 30lbs (a bit loose but the velcroed fabric underneath and buckle kept it from feeling too loose). Now it fits great, she is 40 lbs, and if she gains another 10’lbs, we’ll see if she is chesty enough to require a large. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: winrobaaa

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be excellent quality. Materials are thick and secure and craftsmanship is good. It fits well overall. I did have to return the initial M size I received as it was a bit smaller than is advertised in my opinion. My dog's chest measured 24". This is supposed to fit chest sizes up to 26". It barely came together though, did not stretch and I was concerned it would not stay on securely if I forced it and also that it would be too tight/restrictive for my dog. I ordered a larger size but was otherwise very impressed with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro on the underside is scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size XS, following the sizing guide and this fits my 15lb malti-poo just fine. My complaint is, because he is on the upper end of the sizing, the velcro strap that covers his belly is exposed (leaving the "hook" side of the velcro strap uncovered), and this becomes really uncomfortable for me when he sits in my lap for a long time, like he does on our boat. The exposed velcro is very scratchy, and I probably should have ordered a size up, if I'd known this. Just an FYI, not a deal breaker. Otherwise, this life jacket seems secure and works for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend. We take our boat out in the gulf and can have choppy waters at times. I wanted something to give our pup extra help while swimming. This was easy to put on. Our pup was able to maneuver fine while wearing. It kept him floating and swimming freely. The handle on the back also came in super handy and sturdy to help get him back in the boat.
customer_reviews.author: ckvandev

customer_reviews.title: Flawed for a safety device
customer_reviews.text: The handle on it (small) is not large enough for an adult hand, just barely so in case you had to grab your pup up real fast this might be an issue. I feel like There’s a design flaw in the loop to attach a leash to, it’s under the handle. I have an extra large dog as well and she has a different brand, the leash loop is on the outside of the handle & it also has reflective features. It fits well but the safety flaws kind of negate the benefits safety. I’ll use it for an older dog that won’t jump from the boat
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Tried other life jackets for my little Shih Tzu but they just didn't fit right. The longer life vests actually tipped her face down into the water. This has a shorter length and great buoyancy which keeps her little face out of the water. She is determined to swim with her Jack Russell brothers and obviously Shih Tzus are not famous for their swimming abilities. This jacket keeps her safe and secure. Very well made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Freelancer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality, remarkable details.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these beautiful life jackets for our rat terriers. The S fit my 15" 18# dog perfectly. The XS was too short in the back for my 12" 13x dog. Both sizes are highly adjustable with extra wide high quality velcro and extra long strapping on adjustable buckles. The XS fit perfectly well other than seeming a little short in the back. When I tried the S on the smaller dog, it also fit perfectly well, but the length was a bit longer so I am going to exchange the XS for a S. The S is 10" long on the back and the XS is 8". Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: K. Eyman

customer_reviews.title: The best life vest out there!
customer_reviews.text: This life vest is great! Our 65 lb Australian Labradoodle can swim easily while wearing it, does not mind wearing this and the handle is great for pulling him out of the water onto our boat. Our dog grew so much in 9 months that we had to buy him a larger life vest and bought the exact same one because we like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Vivaglory astounded me with their fantastic customer service. I had accidentally ordered the wrong size for my pet and they were super understanding, compassionate, and quick to help me fix it. Great communication that made me feel valued. Once the right size arrived for my little baby, I couldn’t have been happier! It fit perfectly, he’s comfortable and i feel safe letting him on the water(I paddle board).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we have a golden retriever who would pout if she ...
customer_reviews.text: we have a golden retriever who would pout if she could not go out on the boat with us. since its a law that dogs must have life jackets on.. and she is a fashionista with a bit of spoiled this was a must have and she loves it.. Don't forget your doggoles to go along with your purchase... Hazel loves the attention she gets when she is swimming at the river or cruising through the channel
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry’s mom

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to put this in the water just yet. But have fitted it to our 18lb. terrier. She seems very comfortable and wears it well. I was impressed by the velcro plus plastic connectors to secure the vest under her mid- section and under her neck. This is item appears simply very well made. They even supply you with an extra piece of velcro so that you can cover the exposed velcro loop area around your dog's neck to avoid getting their hair caught. Very well made and well thought out. product. I'm assuming it floats!
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I just Got these life jackets delivered. We haven’t used them in water wet, so I cant Say how they work in water. I’ve got a Boston terrier who is 18 pounds and a Boston terrier mix who is 22 pounds. I ordered the small for both of them and they fit great! You can adjust the straps to fit each dog perfect. I cant wait to take them in the water and see how they really work!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: True Safety Equipment For Your Dog
customer_reviews.text: A dog that sank when she tried to swim, her Vivaglory Sports Style Ripstop Vest worked like a charm when, her first time in a boat, she jumped into the lake and was easily retrieved by the handle as she swam to the boat. She has complete freedom of movement and the ripstop material holds up well in the underbrush. The high visibility of the vest provides comfort knowing she can readily be seen by drivers, hunters or other. Love this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: XL great size for German Shepherd/Labrador mutt
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd/Labrador mutt approx 80 lbs fit the XL. He is a reluctant but solid swimmer in our pool so we bought this life vest for safety swimming at a lake on vacation. He typically swims out to get his ball and right back out of the pool. With the vest on, he paddles around for a few minutes before getting out of the pool. He paddled around at the lake as well. He pulls like crazy when he wants to see a dog or person and the leash clip held fast.
customer_reviews.author: All Day Mom

customer_reviews.title: No lifeguard needed
customer_reviews.text: We have a "bully breed" who thinks he can swim - spoiler alert- he's drownding and too stupid to realize it. This allowed us to take him on a friend's boat without constant worry. The lift strap is very secure, during the try on phase we could carry him around like drooling, snorting luggage, and he's 80+ pounds
customer_reviews.author: pete's mom

customer_reviews.title: Handle is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the life jacket makes it so so easy to pluck our girl out of the water. We kayaked many times this summer and went she’d go overboard it was so easy to pull her back in. It also has a lash attachment so while we kayaked we would hook her leash to her and us just in case something we’re to happen. The color of the life jackets are cute and make it easy to spot them in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy grew out of hers and I had to get the next size up but the brand was no longer available. I found this and it works fantastically. The reason I gave it one star for a stretch because it doesn't stretch. I kayak with my dog a lot and we go on boats and yes she's falling off and I've had to use the back handle to lift her up and put her back in the boat. I'm very glad this doesn't stretch. It looks comfy but I can't tell cuz I'm not the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve K. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This life jacket is so cute and worked so well on my little French Bulldog. We ordered her a medium and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have even for strong swimmers!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Me and my dog love it. My dog gets excited when I go to put it on him because he knows it's play time in the pool. It fit great, doesn't restrict his movement, and keeps him at the perfect floating level for stress free, safe swimming. I really like the way it also has a floating bar that goes under his neck to keep his head up. After a couple uses, he learned that he doesn't have to constantly paddle to stay afloat and now casually swims around and is not scared of being in the water with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Chris- NY

customer_reviews.title: XS Fits my Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: The XS fits Butch the boat dog perfectly and he can still mark his territory without issues. He's a Miniture Pincer/Chihuahua mix. He loves it and prances around like he's in Sports Illistrated. I purchased the safety orange color because it stands out better in the Blue Green waters of coastal Forida.
customer_reviews.author: Trust me I'm a Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60# GSD pup that is hasn't quite reached total comfort in water, swimming. This life jacket is thick, without being restricting to her and fits her perfectly. The handle is sturdy enough that I can literally pick her off the ground with it, without fear of it ripping off the vest. Added bonus, it doubled as an anxiety vest and calms down some of her puppy energy when she's wearing it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney VanRooyen

customer_reviews.title: I would get it again
customer_reviews.text: Runs small in the lower rib/chest area. I have a 40lbs medium dog and it barely fit on the chest. I would size up from their recommended size but then again.. I didn’t size up because it still technically barely fits. There is a good bit of exposed velcro that could be annoying if he were to wear it all day. It helps him float though and he is super easy to spot! I’ve got a 12 year old and he just needs that extra float so he doesn’t tire out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It was nice quality and fit our dog well but it seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: It was nice quality and fit our dog well but it seemed to cause her to nose down in the water. The back was more buoyant than the front. We added some cut off pieces of the Noodle Foam around the neck and that helped. We ended up just buying a Rough Wear life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect life jacket for our dog! We practiced in the pool for an upcoming trip on the water. Even though she didn’t like it at first, we got it on quickly and easily and she soon realized how fun it was. She is about 52 lbs and is wearing the L. Climbing up the ladder is a little harder than without the life jacket but she figured it out. Wish it came in purple but besides that we are completely happy!
customer_reviews.author: miami mom

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying this life jacket because I thought the more expensive brands might be better quality, but I could not be happier with this purchase. It's easy to put on, keeps the dog's head up in the water, and (bonus) it's cute. The only caveat is that this jacket does run small. I bought a medium and it just barely fits around her middle, even though she measures for a medium. Next time I'll buy a large. UPDATE 5/13/20: We bought a large when she outgrew the first one and we still this is an amazing jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Doller

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for active water dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these vests for my dogs a German Shepherd and Lab. Both are around 80lbs, girth around 30-31" bought the size large for both. The vests were easy to adjust and worked well. The handle was strong enough to lift an 80lb dog out of the water and onto the boat. Definitely recommend buying a vest with a handle if you are anticipating any type of water/boating sport with your dog. Impressed with this vest. It also held up to their playful behaviors such as rolling around, playing fetch, rough play etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah H

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This was the third jacket I’ve purchased trying to find the right fit. The color is more of a neon orange/pink (NOT the color I was hoping for, was hoping for a bright, hot pink-hence the loss of a star). By the time I found this, my pittie was comfortable enough in the pool to swim a few laps without it so we’ve never even used it. Will probably return it for that reason only.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Life Jacket for my Lab
customer_reviews.text: The large fit my 63lb Labrador perfectly. It was simple to put on and felt very secure, both the neck and belly areas had velcro and buckle closure. It was light weight, bright in color, and did not impair his movement at all. He was totally comfortable wearing it for two days while at the lake. Great purchase! (I will try to update with pictures soon).
customer_reviews.author: K.Will

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: These life jackets seem well made and I was happy with the quality but even after I measured three times they were too small. I have a lab puppy and lab mix puppy with 21” and 22” widths. They are 30 and 33lbs. I ordered mediums and I couldn’t get the Velcro to go around their chests. I would gladly have exchanged them for larges but they were out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: CanonFan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality dog pfd
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the orange one for easy visibility. It seems very sturdy and well crafted. We haven't had the chance to use the pfd, since we haven't been out on the water yet. It does fit my dog well and i like the handle on the top. Looking forward to the summer months to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: V. ARCHER

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner swimming dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old German Shepard to help her swimming, I have to say it is a pleasure! The quality is good, I love the nice aqua blue color and the design is great! She swims so confidently now, it was so worth the money. I will be buying one for our 3 year old Shepard too so that when we go out on our boat she doesn’t get tired swimming in the deep water! Great product. My only complaint is that it is not a product made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My pup wasn’t sure of it but kept her afloat! You can also keep them on the leash with the jacket. It has security clips over the Velcro to secure your pup in the jacket. My pup is an escape artist. She finds her way out of everything so I like to have secure harnesses to keep her in. 100% worth the money if your pup has a hard time keeping their head above the water!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Tripawd Front Leg Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our front leg amputee pup and it works great! She is easily able to still use her front leg in the water to propel herself and doesn't seem to mind wearing it! Since it is so humid where we live, we were worried about her getting hot in it out of the water, but we brought along a cooling pad for her to lie on and she seemed to be pretty happy! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Goldendoodle loves it
customer_reviews.text: My goldendoodle is long-legged with a skinny rear. She loves to fetch balls from the pool, but her lack of fat had her working hard. She seems to actually enjoy wearing the vest and it definitely helps her keep her head above the water. Only issue was that it ran smaller than expected. She's a mini and weighs about 38lbs. I bought the medium. It fit, but just barely. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Frederick

customer_reviews.title: SIZING! Order Big!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the guidelines on the sizing chart and I have 2 cattle dogs on the smaller side, 1 measuring 24" and the other 25" around their rib cage. According to the size chart I ordered mediums and the velcro barely fastened on the smaller one and wouldn't even reach to fasten on the other. So I had to return them for larges and Amazon charged me $6 a piece to return the others. Overall I like the life jackets but not happy that they ran so small and I was charged the additional fees. My dogs weigh 35 and 45 pounds and the needed size large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they seem pretty sturdy and definitely look like they'll be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (different sizes) for my two dogs. I haven't had the chance to test them out yet, but they seem pretty sturdy and definitely look like they'll be able to support my non-swimming breeds. However, on both my dogs, the neck wrap part seems to be too big so it doesn't fit completely well. Also, the XS is actually still a little too big for my little 6 lb dog. Not sure how well it'll work since it doesn't fit as snugly as the other size I got.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small, from our experience
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your dog. You will probably need a size up. I have two dogs who are ~50lbs and fit in medium everything their entire life. Well, they need a Large in this.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pup safe IF they want to be in water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as we rented a beach house with a pool and didn’t know how our French Bulldog Tula would feel about it. Wanted to be safe in the event she decided she wanted to be in it. It fit her well, was easy to put on and would have kept her safe. Needless to say she wasn’t a fan of the pool (as her face indicates) and we didn’t end up needing it. Better safe than sorry though!
customer_reviews.author: llp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a puppy
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly , the bottom flaps that go around the belly are a stretchy material. This is perfect for a growing pup. There is a handle that can pull him up. And a ring on the back that you can clip the leash to. I absolutely love this product 10/10 would recommend. My puppy doesn’t mind it being on. The best part is the neck support this is to help him keep his head out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Girth runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my dogs. The fit on the girth runs small. I cant upgrade size because then the vest is to large for the dog and would hinder more than help. I am going to look for a way to extend the girth strap and then it should be adequate. The blue one I recieved had a tear in it when I opened the package. I hope it doesn't RIP further but we will see. Might ask to exchange it if it doesn't hold along that seem.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: easy and secure
customer_reviews.text: my labradoodle puppy isn't the best swimmer (yet) so I ordered this life jacket for her. It fits perfectly and has plenty of room to grow (she's 16 lbs and I got a size small). It's super adjustable and easy to get the right fit. She has full range of motion and seems quite comfortable. I love the rescue handle on the back. I know I could get her out of the water quickly if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Anthis

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lifejacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and perfect for our Australian Shepherd. Our Aussie is about 45-50 lbs, so I ordered a medium based on the measurements for sizing. I measured our dog with a tape measure accurately and felt confident with the medium. When we got it and tried it on him it fits pretty good when adjusted but is a tiny bit snug otherwise. If I could redo the order I’d definately size up especially if your dog has a deep-dipping chest. But it still fits him comfortably so still a five star product!
customer_reviews.author: nat.driss

customer_reviews.title: Great Life Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect life jacket for a dog! My dog is a 45 pound beagle/coonhound mix. She was right in between the sizes for medium and large, so I ordered a medium and it fits perfect! The Velcro around the stomach barely fits around her, but the buckles have plenty of slack so it doesn’t squeeze her. My dog didn’t swim very far before getting this, now she’ll jump in the water by herself and swim around for awhile. Doesn’t hold water like other reviews say, and the handle is great to lift your dog out of water if needed. Lightweight and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: littlehouse3

customer_reviews.title: Well built jacket, too long for my English Bulldog.
customer_reviews.text: This life jacket seems very sturdy and well made. I like how it looks. Very secure. I chose a large according to dog measurements on the size chart. However, the jacket is too long for my boy and covers his male parts, so if he were to urinate, he would inside the jacket. I also feel that the jacket is stiff, but maybe they all are, I don’t know. I have contacted the company to see if a medium will resolve the issue. I will update, otherwise I need to return as this jacket just does not fit my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: We love this doggie life jacket. We got a small for our border collie who is on the smaller side (35lbs, 24in chest) and it fits pretty well, the Velcro on the middle is a little short but the buckles are the right length. I think our dog would be able to swim fine without it but it made us feel better taking her out paddle boarding, she can swim easily with it on. The handle on top is super helpful for getting her back on the board if she falls off too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, good color selection.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to put on your dog. Design permits good freedom of movement. Good color selections. Handle on top is great for picking up a small dog. Cons: Hook side of the velcro catches on fabrics. The smaller section on the collar comes with a section of velcro that can be trimmed to cover the exposed hook side of the Velcro, but nothing is provided to do the same for the velcro on the belly section of the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is about ninety pounds and this was just the right fit. The dog didn't seem to mind having it on and in the water you could tell it helped him a lot. He also swam a lot faster with this on. They will try to climb up on you while you are in the water. With this on you can easily hold the dog up and let him rest for a moment. Just added safety.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very cute I like it she sinks like a rock with out it. She isnt much of a water dog but i feel better with her wearing this. It even has a clip on it for a leash and a handle for easy grabbing. I got the green cause it's nice and bright. Sadie doesnt really like it cause it means shes going to have to get in the water lol
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that I have ever ordered! Super cheap, and works perfect. It is also adorable and has style. I have a 15 pound shepard poodle mix and she has a very narrow waist. We take her to the lake all the time and I worry about her jumping off so we keep the vest on her. She is a lot more confident with the vest on and it holder her wait up very well. Very happy with this and would most definitely recommend for any dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We got this to take my smaller dog on my paddleboard with me. She is older and had never been. This vest was perfect. It gave her some buoyancy and gave me a handle to scoop her up onto the board. We even used it to transfer her between my SUP and my husband's kayak. She was right between sizes. I got her the small, but wish I had gotten the medium. It still worked great. There was enough given and stretch to hook her up. She didn't love the adventure, but at least I knew she was safe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Our puppers is not a natural swimmer (she jumped off the dock and almost drown) so we decided that a dog life jacket might help! After the dock incident, she was timid around water but this life jacket has given her confidence again! (It makes us feel more comfortable too) It didn’t seem to impact her range of motion and she didn’t mind having it on. It has a handle and hook for attaching a leash which is also a really nice feature. Seems to be of good quality! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mags467

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my chihuahua. She goes on my paddle board with me and I get worried she’ll jump or fall off and I’ll be too high up to grab her. The back handle is amazing. I went by the size chart and the only issue was the neck was definitely big. It comes with extra Velcro that you can measure and put on it so it doesn’t get stuck to their fur, but I think it’d be nicer if it was just a bit smaller in the neck region.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Bulldog approved !
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th one purchased . They usually last about one season. My dog loves the pool and is it daily when pool season is here. So gets lots a wear and tear . I am sure it would last longer if not used daily . By end of season the Velcro is usually falling apart . My bulldog is very top heavy and sink without this . Will continue to purchase .
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I took my dog kayaking for the first time and he loved it! I was glad that he had the life jacket on because he jumped off after some duck that were on the lake. When he realized he was in the water he was like "what happened?! Why is the boat moving away? AAAAAAA." But it was super easy to get him back in, all I had to do was lift him up by the handle! A great feature. Also, I kept him on leash to the little ring to attach a leash was a nice feature too. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rilla

customer_reviews.title: Easy, comfortable and well-made.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the XS for our puppy when he was 4 months (7 lbs) and at 6 months old (and just over 10lbs) it still fits him perfectly. He is a bit of a Houdini but still was unable to get out of this and he seems comfortable wearing it. We love the handle. It's great! Easy on and off the boat. We went with a bright color to make him easy to spot in the water. Definitely, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs who love to swim!!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 18 pound female Corgi named Molly who is about 12 years old. We bought this life vest for her at the reccommendation of our vet. Molly swims all summer and her hips work so hard and they get sore. This life vest has helped make swimming a lot easier for her! It is a little big on her (I should have maybe ordered one size down) but so far it works great. We can see that she is not bothered by her hip pain this week since she has been wearing the vest! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: CinaScharr

customer_reviews.title: Makes swimming easier!
customer_reviews.text: This life jacket helped my dog be more confident in the pool! The first time we introduced her to the pool, she struggled to keep her head above the water and paddled ferociously. Now that she has her life jacket, her paddling has slowed down and she is obviously more comfortable in the water. She can comfortably swim around in the pool without immediately looking for an exit point. For reference, she is a 30lb pit mix with a larger chest and small head/neck. The velcro belly strap is good quality and the buckles add an extra layer of security. This product has clearly made a deference in how my dog swims and keeps her happily afloat!
customer_reviews.author: Hana McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Body Inclusivity! HA!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the smallest possible size for our Yorkie. As you can see in the photos, the neck portion is too large; she can slip her front paws through. We will likely have to cut part of it off and sew the fabric together - however, this is my only complaint! Great quality, affordable price! My little dog doesn’t seem to mind it much. Love having a life jacket for her in case she happens to fall in the water. Please consider making a smaller size for our little nuggets! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I took my active golden retriever to the beach and wanted her to have fun running and playing, but also wanted her to be safe. This life vest was PERFECT! It was easy to adjust, easy to put on and take off, and most importantly.....it allowed her to have full range of motion without restrictions AND kept her safe. I highly recommend this vest!
customer_reviews.author: goldens

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and the velcro close with extra latch to stap my dog inside the vest. It fits perfectly. My dog as full range of motion and is not irritated by it when i place. I wish the ring to attach a leash were metal and not hard plastic. I felt comfortable with my dog in the water at the beach by my side secured by the vest and leash.
customer_reviews.author: Kruby

customer_reviews.title: Cute / Super Strong / Fits Around Awesome/Total Water Confidence!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dog vest!! I was at first wanting to know what I compromised for this inexpensive price.....ANSWER: Nothing!! I bought one from REI for $75 but it was too large and I needed one asap for a SUP excursion so I ordered this one. It matches my REI life vest (personal bonus), all the velcro and clasps are super strong. My lil Hennessey did fall in after getting spooked from a sea plane...but I was able to pull him up asap and the handle was really strong. EXCELLENT PRODUCT!! Let me know if this review helped your furry child out!! * Hennessey is 22lbs and wears a medium in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: cecille r schuman

customer_reviews.title: For the swimmiest dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Our rescue pup loves, loves to swim! We were going to a friends river house & knew that it would be impossible to keep him out of the water, so I ordered this vest. It was perfect! We could easily lift him up onto the dock when needed. I also felt better about him swimming for such a long stretch of time. He literally would not get out! He swam for hours, happy as he could be & I felt totally secure with this vest.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable but not quite a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I find that the small is a bit too small for my one dog that weighs 38 pounds and is super petite but the medium is way too big on her. I feel the same way about the medium for our other dog of the same breed that weighs 60 pounds. I followed all the measurement directions. However, the handles are great and durable for plucking the pups out of the water and back onto the boat. They are also nice and bright so the dogs are visible to other boaters.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Wold

customer_reviews.title: great for dogs who love to swim (and chase ducks into the middle of the lake)
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our American Bulldog that loves to swim but is pretty brave and forgets that she might tire out after chasing ducks across the lake. The handle on top is perfect to pick her up onto a dock or paddle board if they fall in. It seems comfortable to wear and swim in but the Velcro might catch on a dog with long hair. Dries quickly and has a place to hook a leash as well as the handle. We used it everyday for a week at the lake and it seems to be holding up quite well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well fitting floatation vest!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller vest for my rottie puppy so that we could go dock diving with the big kids at a NADDs event this weekend. I didn't want to spend a ton of money if she wasn't going to enjoy the sport. I opted for the vivaglory bright yellow sports flotation vest. It fits her perfectly and the color is fantastic!!! I may have to get the big rotties the same vest in a larger size. The cost is very reasonable for a nicely made product! Now I'm just hoping that pup will jump off the dock this weekend. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Rottenweilers

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. not for corgis!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a normal dog, this will be the best life jacket ever!! The floatation is amazing and the quality is outstanding. It can definitely support a heavy dog. If you have a dwarf dog, move along. I can’t really use it. I have a 32pnd pembroke welsh corgi who loves water but gained a few pounds, so the Medium size might fit, but probably would be tight. I had measured and i grabbed a Large. All things considered, it fits.. however he can’t lay down/ sit in it because he’s not long enough for it. With being an avid kayaker i need something a bit more mobile for him, so I’ll be returning this unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Could use one improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size large for my 60 pounds goldendoodle puppy and it fits him well. It is secure buy still allows him to move comfortably and freely. Today was his first time in the water and it provided safety and support as he figured out the doggy paddle! The reason I took off one star is because the leash hook is plastic. With the other quality materials, I don't know why they would add a plastic leash attachment instead of metal. For my 60 pound puppy, I don't know how long this piece will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket for my corgi!
customer_reviews.text: The Medium was a great fit for my Cardigan Welsh Corgi! It's helping him become more confident in the water, as he would sink when trying to swim before adding the Vivaglory vest. The vest seems to be well made. I love the bright colors and wide range of options. Being available in neon green was a selling point for me as it is his color.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bully with skin sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: It works... as a life jacket... unfortunately for my bully breed and her sensitive skin the underneath was just too harsh on her skin and caused a major rash meaning she had to be kept out of the water for the rest of our week long vacation after day one. It also means unfortunately we used this once and can never use it again so it was a waste of money for me- it works, but if you have a bully breed with skin sensitivity be cautious and keep an eye on skin irritation! I’m sure it’s great for some dogs, just awful for mine!
customer_reviews.author: A.D.G.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS - Little dog fell in the drink
customer_reviews.text: Bought the extra small for a 6 lb Yorkie/Pomeranian mix. She likes to sit on the nose of the kayak and has fallen in the lake once while wearing the vest. The water lapped over her head or came close at times but she took it in stride and kept paddling in her vest. The handle was really helpful but I had to grab her paw underwater to get her closer first before I could use the handle. I could tell she felt like a boss thinking she was swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, fast shipping, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 18lb Alaskan Klee Kai. His lifevest fit him perfectly! He was comfortable enough to run and play in it and it also helped to keep him afloat during his first day swimming. This vest is a great success. I love all the safety features, including the reflective vest, grab handle, and buckles.
customer_reviews.author: thia

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket for Dogs Learning to Dock Dive
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this life jacket for my dog. LOVE the color! Quality is good. Easy to put on and fits securely. My dog readily wore it from the first moment I put it on her. Along with keeping her buoyant as she swims, it looks really good on her also!
customer_reviews.author: SpaceMom125

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket for our chocolate lab who swims all day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a small size for our dog who was growing up at the lake. Loved the fit and quality so as she grew we ordered a larger size. We didn’t have it very long and a buckle broke. The sellers provided me with a new one at no charge! My dog will wear this all day, doesn’t bother her at all. And she looks super cute in it. The quality is great, and the handle makes it easier to get her out of the water and onto the boat. Will continue to buy this same jacket as needed and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgann

customer_reviews.title: Golden doodle approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 45 lb golden doodle to go paddle boarding on the lake and he loves it. It keeps him floating and upright so he can speed pedal around with no issue. We could tell it gave him confidence in his swimming with his tail wagging the whole time (we had a hard time getting him to come out of the lake). Only con is that the Velcro fit around the neck is a bit big on him and doesn’t fit perfectly, it still works but takes some adjustment every so often. I assume this is just because he has a smaller neck but a barreled chest.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t have a chance to try this life jacket on our pooch, the Carr Fire in Northern California happened right after we bought it and destroyed our lakeshores. It looks adorable, fits well on a Chihuahua/Doxie Cross and is well made. We will give it a go next summer
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Life savers
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. I bought 2, one for each of our frenchies. Adjustable enough to fit on 24lb female or 30lb male, and room to grow since there still pups. The male would sink like a rock without his vest, but he pops right back up with it on. The handles on top make it easy to pluck them up out of water when kayaking or paddle boarding with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: It did it’s job!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It totally did what we wanted it to do. Went in a canoe trip with our dog and she fell out of the canoe. This vest kept her floating and we quickly grabbed her up by the handle on the top of the vest. It secures very well with straps and Velcro. I highly recommend this flotation life vest!!! So glad our little girl is safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Spouse loves them for the pups.
customer_reviews.text: Bright yellow helps to keep an eye on them. Update: Leash d-ring strap broke away on the large one. Could be better. Medium has better attachment point. Considered taking away a star for that but still really like the floaties overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two size XS for my Schipperkees who weigh 10-15 lbs. They fit perfectly. You must go by their measurements exactly. The dogs move around freely and don’t seem to mind wearing them. They have a handle on the top to pick them up plus a d-ring to hook a leash. The green was the only color available but my black dogs look great in the color. It is very easy to spot them. We have them on a boat in the ocean so I want them safe and secure. These do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Cute and does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest! Sadly, I ordered a size too small for my 40lb female Shepherd... But I’ve extended the buckles as far out as they will go and it works like a charm. The Velcro underneath doesn’t clasp together because her chest is too big. But it still holds her up in the water! Great purchase... Owner error!
customer_reviews.author: John Hambright

customer_reviews.title: Safest Voyage
customer_reviews.text: My son and I decided to teach our dog how to ride on a paddle board. His first time out he jumped into the river and was quickly picked up by the convenient handle on top. It’s a sturdy jacket and we feel confident he is safe. Now “Bill Murray Jr” barks when he knows it’s time to go out on another adventure...sooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because the size runs a little small. Other than that the product is well built and the handle on top helps to receive our 50 lb German Shepard with ease. The design is great and allows the dog to have full movement while he is wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great life jacket. It has fit our border collie from about 15 to now 25 lbs. It will probably fit her for another 10 lbs. She swims easily with it, and it leaves her legs free to move on the boat and in the water. The handle is great for getting her back in the boat. I will probably need the next size up one her fur fills out, but as it is--perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. F

customer_reviews.title: Buy without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an active Labrador puppy who loves the water and is frequently in rivers creeks and lakes. Floatation is excellent...handle is a plus for pulling her into boat and the vest fits comfortably and is easy to put on. Also has D-ring for leash.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dogs so they would feel comfortable in the water while we were on our family camping trip. On previous trips, they had found being in the water to be a bit scary and overwhelming, but once they realized the silly vests helped them float, we couldn't get them out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: daphne

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our 50lb pitbull isn’t a great swimmer. This lifevest was the best purchase we ever made. We feel comfortable bringing her our on the boat and she has the confidence to swim for hours. The handle on the back is perfect for pulling her back up onto the boat. We ordered a size large and it’s a perfect fit. We secure the neck strap first and then slip it over her head. We’ve found that’s easier since it’s a little bulky and awkward to do while it’s on. It dries quickly. Every compliments how cute she is in it. All in all, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vivaglory New Sports Style Ripstop Dog Life Jacket Safety Vest with Superior Buoyancy & Rescue Handle
feature_bullets: MEASURE BEFORE PURCHASE: before choosing a size, please measure your dog's ribcage at the DEEPEST part; do NOT judge your dog's size from weight or other brands' standard; if your dog's measurement is between sizes, please choose the next size up for more comfortable fit

New Sports Style Design: Sports-style design gives your beloved dog a new look and does not hinder his/her natural movement. Thoughtful strategically positioned neck design not only provides more space but also keeps your dog in a natural swimming position, making them feel more comfortable and eased

Safe Material: The materials of Vivaglory dog life jacket have passed CA65 test, keeping your dog safe wherever he/she roams. Upgraded ripstop 600D oxford cloth makes our safety vest quite durable. Heavy-duty yet more comfortable fastening system around the belly and neck to keep securely fastened

High Visibility: Designed with bright colors and Reflective trims, our pet life jackets can enhance visibility in and out of water or low-light conditions; No worry about your dog disappearing from your sight

Our Services: ONLY when buying from Vivaglory directly, you will get Genuine Vivaglory Brand products and 90 day's warranty. Email to our customer care specialists 7 days a week with any questions. We are waiting to assist you and your pet with your product needs

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
